definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
lit. the toad wants to eat swan meat (idiom)/fig. to try to punch above one's weight
pinyin: lai4 ha2 ma5 xiang3 chi1 tian1 e2 rou4

definition: tokay gecko (Gekko gecko), used in TCM
giant clam/geoduck (Panopea abrupta)/elephant trunk clam/same as 象拔蚌[xiang4 ba2 bang4]
geoduck (Panopea abrupta)/elephant trunk clam/same as 象拔蚌[xiang4 ba2 bang4]

sentences.english: No laboratory analysis service for saxitoxin test in humans is currently available in Macao.
sentences.chinese: 本澳目前并无对人体中石房蛤毒素含量的实验室检测。

sentences.english: In France they love mussels, yet clams are generally considered dirty.
sentences.chinese: 法国人喜欢吃壳类食物，但是蛤通常被认为是很脏的。

sentences.english: Our lunch of freshly BBQ'd goodies including oysters, clams, mussels, pippies and some kind of conch shells.
sentences.chinese: 我们的午餐包括新鲜烤的牡蛎，蚌，蛤，蜊和螺丝。

sentences.english: W. S:Why don't you try Chablis for clams on half shell?
sentences.chinese: 你们为何不试饮一下白葡萄酒配半个蛤呢？

sentences.english: A clam, found in waters off Iceland, lived to be 507 years old.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛水域发现的一种蛤可以活到507岁。

sentences.english: These include mollusks like clams and oysters, and reef-building corals.
sentences.chinese: 包括类似蛤和牡蛎的软体动物，以及礁石结构的珊瑚。

sentences.english: Clams and oysters provide similar benefits.
sentences.chinese: 蛤和牡蛎也提供了相似的益处。

sentences.english: A young quahog suitable to be eaten raw.
sentences.chinese: 一种可以生吃的小圆蛤。

sentences.english: Some sea-creatures, like clams and cockles.
sentences.chinese: 有些海洋动物，像蛤和鸟蛤。

definition: abbr. for Bengbu prefecture-level city 蚌埠市[Beng4 bu4 shi4], Anhui
